meta_text: A_The Dissection Teaching on the Steps of the Path to Enlightenment, an Easy Path for Travelling to the State of All-Knowingness, presented as Instruction based upon his Personal Experience by Our Sheltering Protector, Absolute Lord over a Thousand Families of Enlightened Angels, that King of the Able Buddhas, He Who is Indivisible from the Keeper of the Diamond, the High and Holy Lobsang Pelden Yeshe, Good and Glorious_PAN CHEN BLA MA SKU PHRENG GSUM PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES (1738-1780)
